column6: mais vos pieds foulent maintenant la terre ferme
column7: cette terre dont vous estes l'héritier. Le trosne est à vous.;Als Ihr vom Tod Eures Vaters erfahrt
column8: verlasst Ihr die Warägergarde und Miklagard in einem großen Beiboot
column9: gefüllt mit der Beute Eurer Schlachten in Serkland. Es war eine lange und gefahrvolle Reise
column10: doch jetzt setzt Ihr Eure Füße auf heimatliche Erde
column11: dir Euer Geburtsrecht ist. Der Thron gehört Euch.;;Al enterarte de la muerte de tu padre
column12: dejas la Guardia Varangiana y dejas Miklagard para volver a casa en un drakkar lleno de botines de tus campañas en Serkland. Fue un largo y peligroso viaje de regreso
column13: pero tus pies están ahora firmemente plantados en la tierra que es tu patrimonio. El trono es tuyo.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1000182292;A local Augur has come to your court to perform a public Auguria
column2: the ceremony is held in a plain outside the castle walls and while approaching clouds make you worrisome
column3: the Augur will not postpone it. After observing the entrails of many sacrifices
column4: the Augur is about to declaim the will of the gods when a bolt of lightning strikes him violently!;Un Augure local est arrivé à votre cour pour réaliser un Augure publique. La cérémonie a lieu dans une plaine à l'extérieur des murs du castel
column5: et alors que l'approche de nuages vous rend inquiet
column6: l'Augure refuse de reporter la cérémonie. Après avoir observé les entrailles de moults sacrifices
column7: l'Augure est sur le point de proclamer la volonté des dieulx quand un éclair le frappe violemment !;A local Augur has come to your court to perform a public Auguria
column8: the ceremony is held in a plain outside the castle walls and while approaching clouds make you worrisome
column9: the Augur will not postpone it. After observing the entrails of many sacrifices

column1: EVTDESC1000182293;While watching the latest play from a local philosopher

column3: though the man in charge assures you they will be taken care of
column4: it is your duty to take charge.;Alors que vous assistez au dernier spectacle d'un philosophe local

column1: EVTDESC1000182308;The citizens of Cyrenaica et Creta can rejoice
column2: as Roman law is once more upheld in this barren land. Yet another ancient Roman province has been returned to the bosom of the mightiest empire the civilised world has ever seen. May it never suffer the cruel touch of barbarians again.;Les citoyens de Cyrénaïque et de Crète peuvent se réjouir
column3: comme la loi romaine est une fois de plus en vigueur dans ces terres arides. Une vieille province romaine de plus est retournée au sein du plus puissant empire que le monde civilisé ait jamais vu. Puisse-t-elle ne plus jamais souffrir aulx mains des barbares.;The citizens of Cyrenaica et Creta can rejoice
column4: as Roman law is once more upheld in this barren land. Yet another ancient Roman province has been returned to the bosom of the mightiest empire the civilised world has ever seen. May it never suffer the cruel touch of barbarians again.;;The citizens of Cyrenaica et Creta can rejoice

column1: EVTDESC1000182311;Viennensis
column2: named after the town Vienne in southeastern Gaul
column3: has long been lost to Roman rule
column4: but has now been incorporated back into the Empire. It was originally formed as a merger of the provinces Gallia Aquitania and Gallia Narbonensis created by Caesar after his campaigns had expanded the old province of Gaul too far to be administered as a single province.;Viennensis
column5: qui doit son nom au bourg de Vienne en Gaule du sud-est
column6: et perdue il y a fort longtemps par Rome
column7: a été réintégrée à l'Empire. Elle avoit été constituée à l'origine d'une fusion entre les provinces Gallia Aquitania et Gallia Narbonensis
column8: créées par César après que ses campagnes aient étendu la vieille province de la Gaule trop loin pour estre administrée comme une province unique.;Viennensis

column1: EVTDESC1000182312;Friends
column2: Romans
column3: countrymen
column4: lend me your ears! After the miraculous recovery of territory lost centuries ago
column5: the Roman Empire has been reborn! Europe has endured dark times since the imperial frontiers were stormed by barbarians and province after province burned at their touch
column6: but now a bright new age has dawned for all of civilization.\n\nThe Roman State will no longer be referred to as the Empire of the Germans by jealous pretenders in the East
column7: but recognized as the true heir to the legacy of Rome. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] rules a restored Imperium Romanum
column8: but much work remains to be done. There is still territory to recover and ancient borders to reclaim. For the Senate and People of Rome!;Oyez
column9: Oyez
column10: amis
column11: Romains
column12: compatriotes ! Après la miraculeuse reconqueste du territoire perdu il y a des siècles de ça
column13: l'Empire Romain est rené de ses cendres ! L'Europe a souffert des temps bien sombres depuis les invasions barbares dans nos frontières
column14: bruslant province après province à leur contact
column15: mais à présent un nouvel asge de lumières est arrivé pour toute la civilisation.\n\nL'Etat Romain ne sera plus désigné comme l'Empire des Germains par de jaloulx prétendants en orient
column16: mais reconnu comme le digne héritier de l'héritage de Rome. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] règne sur un Imperium Romanum restauré
column17: mais il reste tant à faire. Il y a des territoires à récupérer et d'anciennes frontières à rétablir. Pour le Sénat le Peuple de Rome !;Friends

column1: EVTDESC1000182313;The Holy Roman Empire
column2: previously referred to as the Empire of the Germans by many in the East
column3: have somehow managed to reclaim enough lost territory to declare the Roman Empire restored! It can no longer be denied that they are the true successors of Rome and its glorious legacy. They claim a new era is upon us.;Le Saint Empire Romain
column4: jusqu'alors désigné sous le nom d'Empire des Germains par beaucoup en orient
column5: a d'une manière ou d'une aultre réussi à reconquérir moults territoires perdus pour déclarer l'Empire Romain restauré ! Il n'est plus possible de nier qu'il s'agit là du véritable successeur de Rome et de son glorieulx héritage. Ils proclament qu'une nouvelle ère s'ouvre à nous.;The Holy Roman Empire
column6: previously referred to as the Empire of the Germans by many in the East

column1: EVTDESC1000182319;Much time has passed since Luxor Temple’s last official use and the peasantry has moved into its location since then. A sad sight it is indeed to see it in its current status. You decide that it is in the best interest of everyone to restore this temple to its former glory and make it a beacon of a revitalized Kemetic religion.;Bien du temps a passé depuis le dernier usage officiel du Temple de Luxor et la paysannerie s'est installée dans ses lieulx depuis. C'est en effet une bien triste vision que le temple dans son état actuel. Vous décidez que c'est dans l'intérest général de restaurer ce temple dans sa gloire d'antan et d'en faire le symbole d'une religion kémite revigorée.;Much time has passed since Luxor Temple’s last official use and the peasantry has moved into its location since then. A sad sight it is indeed to see it in its current status. You decide that it is in the best interest of everyone to restore this temple to its former glory and make it a beacon of a revitalized Kemetic religion.;;Much time has passed since Luxor Temple’s last official use and the peasantry has moved into its location since then. A sad sight it is indeed to see it in its current status. You decide that it is in the best interest of everyone to restore this temple to its former glory and make it a beacon of a revitalized Kemetic religion.;;;;;;;;;

EVTDESC1000182320;The restoration of Luxor Temple is nearly complete and your chief architect inquires if you’d like to add a new wing to the temple.;La restauration du Temple de Luxor est pesque achevée et votre architecte en chef vous demande si vous aimeriez ajouter une nouvelle aile au temple.;The restoration of Luxor Temple is nearly complete and your chief architect inquires if you’d like to add a new wing to the temple.;;The restoration of Luxor Temple is nearly complete and your chief architect inquires if you’d like to add a new wing to the temple.;;;;;;;;;

EVTDESC1000182321;The temple has finally been restored to its former glory.;Le temple a enfin été restauré à la hauteur de sa splendeur d'antan.;The temple has finally been restored to its former glory.;;The temple has finally been restored to its former glory.;;;;;;;;;

EVTDESC1000182322;It would seem that the Egyptians have been very busy recently. A recent resurgence of Kemetic fanaticism has swept Egypt and the pinnacle of their fanaticism has been reached with the restoration of Luxor Temple. Located on the east bank of the Nile
column2: this temple is both splendid to withhold and enormous in size. It even holds an entirely new wing
column3: attached to the groundwork of the original temple.;Il sembleroit que les Egyptiens aient été actifs ces derniers temps. L'Egypte a été prise récemment par une recrudescence du fanatisme kémite et le summum de leur fanatisme a été atteint avec la restauration du Temple de Luxor. Situé sur la rive est du Nil
column4: ce temple est à la fois d'une beauté à couper le souffle et d'une taille gigantesque. Il abrite mesme une nouvelle aile
column5: attenante aulx fondations du temple d'origine.;It would seem that the Egyptians have been very busy recently. A recent resurgence of Kemetic fanaticism has swept Egypt and the pinnacle of their fanaticism has been reached with the restoration of Luxor Temple. Located on the east bank of the Nile
column6: this temple is both splendid to withhold and enormous in size. It even holds an entirely new wing
column7: attached to the groundwork of the original temple.;;It would seem that the Egyptians have been very busy recently. A recent resurgence of Kemetic fanaticism has swept Egypt and the pinnacle of their fanaticism has been reached with the restoration of Luxor Temple. Located on the east bank of the Nile
column8: this temple is both splendid to withhold and enormous in size. It even holds an entirely new wing
column9: attached to the groundwork of the original temple.;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182323;For quite some time now you have watched the steady decline of [Root.Religion.GetName]. No longer can you sit idly by while your people suffer at the hands of zealots and madmen of [Root.Religion.GetName]. From now on you will lead your people back to the teachings of your forefathers!;Depuis quelques temps maintenant
column2: vous avez assisté au déclin constant de [Root.Religion.GetName]. Vous ne pouvez plus rester à rien faire alors que votre peuple souffre aulx mains des zélotes et des fous de [Root.Religion.GetName]. À partir de maintenant
column3: vous guiderez votre peuple sur la voie du retour aulx enseignements de vos pères !;For quite some time now you have watched the steady decline of [Root.Religion.GetName]. No longer can you sit idly by while your people suffer at the hands of zealots and madmen of[Root.Religion.GetName]. From now on you will lead your people back to the teachings of your forefathers!;;For quite some time now you have watched the steady decline of [Root.Religion.GetName]. No longer can you sit idly by while your people suffer at the hands of zealots and madmen of[Root.Religion.GetName]. From now on you will lead your people back to the teachings of your forefathers!;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182324;The Jewish community in my realm is prospering greatly
column2: however there are opposing voices in my court on the matter. The republican faction actively defends the need for the community as a boon to both myself and the city
column3: however the religious faction condemns that I am giving safe haven to them. It is undeniable that I could make a great profit by purging them from the cities they dwell in by displacing them from the realm.;La communauté juive de mon royaume prospère considérablement
column4: mais il y a cependant des voix mécontentes qui s'élèvent à ce sujet dans ma cour. La Faction Républicaine défend activement le besoin de cette communauté comme une bénédiction pour le bourg et pour moi
column5: mais la Faction Religieuse désapprouve le refuge que vous leur donnez. Il est indéniable que je pourrois tirer un grand profit en les purgeant des bourgs où ils résident et en les bannissant du royaume.;The Jewish community in my realm is prospering greatly
column6: however there are opposing voices in my court on the matter. The republican faction actively defends the need for the community as a boon to both myself and the city
column7: however the religious faction condemns that I am giving safe haven to them. It is undeniable that I could make a great profit by purging them from the cities they dwell in by displacing them from the realm.;;The Jewish community in my realm is prospering greatly
column8: however there are opposing voices in my court on the matter. The republican faction actively defends the need for the community as a boon to both myself and the city
column9: however the religious faction condemns that I am giving safe haven to them. It is undeniable that I could make a great profit by purging them from the cities they dwell in by displacing them from the realm.;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182325;The pharaohs of ancient times would often have massive tombs erected in their honour during their reign. Such effort was put into the construction of these pyramids that often decades would go by before being completed and the pharaoh who commissioned the pyramid would already be long dead. Regardless
column2: it was seen as a very prestigious and important thing to do as a pharaoh.;Les pharaons des temps anciens érigeoient souvent d'imposantes tombes en leur honneur pendant leur règne. La construction de ces pyramides représentoit un labeur si titanesque que des décennies estoient souvent nécessaires pour les construire et les pharaons qui en avoient lancé la construction estoient défunts depuis longtemps. Quoi qu'il en soit
column3: c'estoit considéré une besogne très prestigieuse et importante à accomplir pour un pharaon.;The pharaohs of ancient times would often have massive tombs erected in their honour during their reign. Such effort was put into the construction of these pyramids that often decades would go by before being completed and the pharaoh who commissioned the pyramid would already be long dead. Regardless
column4: it was seen as a very prestigious and important thing to do as a pharaoh.;;The pharaohs of ancient times would often have massive tombs erected in their honour during their reign. Such effort was put into the construction of these pyramids that often decades would go by before being completed and the pharaoh who commissioned the pyramid would already be long dead. Regardless
column5: it was seen as a very prestigious and important thing to do as a pharaoh.;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182326;Over a decade has passed since the construction of this pyramid began. Over a hundred thousand workers toiled during this period
column2: often times giving their very lives in order to honour their sacred pharaoh. One cannot deny the sheer impressiveness of this structure.;Plus d'une décennie s'est écoulée depuis le début de la construction de cette pyramide. Pendant cette période
column3: plus de cent mille ouvriers ont travaillé dur sur ce projet
column4: souvent en donnant leur propre vie afin d'honorer leur pharaon sacré. On ne peult nier la pure magnificence de ce bastiment.;Over a decade has passed since the construction of this pyramid began. Over a hundred thousand workers toiled during this period
column5: often times giving their very lives in order to honour their sacred pharaoh. One cannot deny the sheer impressiveness of this structure.;;Over a decade has passed since the construction of this pyramid began. Over a hundred thousand workers toiled during this period
column6: often times giving their very lives in order to honour their sacred pharaoh. One cannot deny the sheer impressiveness of this structure.;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182330;Long has it been that Kemetism was a majority in the lands of Egypt. No longer shall false prophets of moon and sickle sway the hearts and minds of the Egyptian people. The High Priesthood of Kemetism has been restored
column2: and a so called Paragon Xroj shall now take of the administration of the lower Priesthood
column3: all under the guidance of a mighty Pharaoh.;Cela faisoit longtemps que le Kémitisme n'estoit plus majoritaire sur les terres d'Egypte. Plus jamais les faulx prophètes de la lune et de la faucille n'influenceront les coeurs et les esprits du peuple égyptien. Le Haut Sacerdoce du Kémitisme a été restauré
column4: et un dénommé Parangon Xroj se chargera désormais de l'administration des rangs inférieurs du clergé
column5: le tout sous la direction d'un puissant Pharaon.;Long has it been that Kemetism was a majority in the lands of Egypt. No longer shall false prophets of moon and sickle sway the hearts and minds of the Egyptian people. The High Priesthood of Kemetism has been restored
column6: and a so-called Paragon Xroj shall now take of the administration of the lower Priesthood
column7: all under the guidance of a mighty Pharaoh.;;Long has it been that Kemetism was a majority in the lands of Egypt. No longer shall false prophets of moon and sickle sway the hearts and minds of the Egyptian people. The High Priesthood of Kemetism has been restored
column8: and a so-called Paragon Xroj shall now take of the administration of the lower Priesthood
column9: all under the guidance of a mighty Pharaoh.;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182331;Word has it that the enemies of Egypt have something new to fear. Warriors atop chariots equipped with bow and arrow alongside fearsome spear troops. Some even whisper that they don helmets in the shape of the old god
column2: Anubis. Regardless of such claims
column3: this new Kemetic holy order will pose a serious threat to all that oppose Kemetism.;À ce qu'on dit
column4: les ennemis de l'Egypte ont une nouvelle raison de la craindre. Des guerriers embarqués dans des chars et équipés d'un arc et de flèches
column5: aulx costés de redoutables piquiers. Certains murmurent mesme qu'ils revestent des casques de la forme d'un dieu ancien
column6: Anubis. Quelle que soit la véracité de ces allégations
column7: ce nouvel ordre saint kémite posera une sérieuse menace à tous ceulx qui s'opposent au Kémitisme.;Word has it that the enemies of Egypt have something new to fear. Warriors atop chariots equipped with bow and arrow alongside fearsome spear troops. Some even whisper that they don helmets in the shape of the old god
column8: Anubis. Regardless of such claims
column9: this new Kemetic holy order will pose a serious threat to all that oppose Kemetism.;;Word has it that the enemies of Egypt have something new to fear. Warriors atop chariots equipped with bow and arrow alongside fearsome spear troops. Some even whisper that they don helmets in the shape of the old god
column10: Anubis. Regardless of such claims
column11: this new Kemetic holy order will pose a serious threat to all that oppose Kemetism.;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182332;With the ongoing success of the Anubis guard
column2: yet another Kemetic holy order has been organized. The Horusian Guard is ready to defend the Egyptian empire from all heathens and heretics that would dare threaten it. Only a fool would attack the Egyptians head on now.;Avec le succès en cours de la garde d'Anubis
column3: un nouvel ordre saint kémite a été créé. La garde d'Horus est preste à défendre l'empire égyptien contre tous les païens et tous les hérétiques qui oseroient le menacer. Seul un fol attaqueroit de front les Egyptiens à présent.;With the ongoing success of the Anubis guard
column4: yet another Kemetic holy order has been organized. The Horusian Guard is ready to defend the Egyptian empire from all heathens and heretics that would dare threaten it. Only a fool would attack the Egyptians head on now.;;With the ongoing success of the Anubis guard

EVTDESC1000182378;My dear friend
column2: raising a child is never an easy thing to do
column3: and I feel that a good friend must provide guidance in such matters.  I humbly request that you grant me the honor of fostering one of your dearest young ones.\n\nWith hopeful regards
column4: \nYour friend
column5: \n[From.GetTitledFirstName];Mon cher ami
column6: il n'est jamais facile d'élever un enfant
column7: et je songe qu'un bon ami doit fournir de bons conseils pour ce genre de choses. Je demande humblement que vous m'accordiez l'honneur d'accueillir et d'élever un de vos chers petits.\n\nAvec mes respects plein d'espoir
column8: \nVotre ami

column1: EVTDESC1000182391;I have been excommunicated for the sin of dishonorable murder.;J'ai été excommunié pour le péché d'un meurtre déshonorant.;Ich bin für die Sünde des unehrenhaften Mords exkommuniziert worden.;;I have been excommunicated for the sin of dishonorable murder.;;;;;;;x;;

EVTDESC1000182392;Being known as a dishonorable murderer is causing me severe mentral stress. Can I really live with what I've done?;Estre connu comme un meurtrier me cause un sévère stress. Puis-je réellement vivre avec ce que j'ai fait ?;Weil bekannt wurde das Ich ein unehrenhafter Mörder bin habe ich Mentale Probleme. Kann ich wirklich damit leben
column2: was ich getan habe?;;Being known as a dishonorable murderer is causing me severe mentral stress. Can I really live with what I've done?;;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182393;I was listening in on my courtiers' conversation when I heard one of them call me a murderer. They are clearly working with my enemies!;J'écoutois discrètement la conversation de mes courtisans lorsque j'ai ouï l'un d'eulx me désigner comme un meurtrier. Il est clair qu'il travaillent pour mes ennemis !;Ich hörte in einem Gespräch meiner Höflinge
column2: das mich einer einen Mörder nannte. Sie arbeiten klar mit meinen Feinden!;;I was listening in on my courtiers' conversation when I heard one of them call me a murderer. They are clearly working with my enemies!;;;;;;;x;;

EVTDESC1000182426;I have learned that [From.GetTitledName] has laid claim to one of my titles on the grounds of ancestral inheritance.;J'ai appris que [From.GetTitledName] a revendiqué l'un de mes titres sur la base de l'héritage ancestral.;I have learned that [From.GetTitledName] has laid claim to one of my titles on the grounds of ancestral inheritance.;;I have learned that [From.GetTitledName] has laid claim to one of my titles on the grounds of ancestral inheritance.;;;;;;;x;;

EVTDESC1000182427;I expressed my wishes and desires for a coronation in Rome to his holiness the Pope. Hopefully he will accept my request so that I can begin inviting my lords to attend the coronation ceremony.;J'ai exprimé mon souhait et mon désir d'estre couronné à Rome par Sa Sainteté le Pape. Avec bon espoir il accèdera à ma requeste et je pourrois commencer à inviter mes seigneurs pour qu'ils assistent au couronnement.;Ich äußerte meine Wünsche und Sehnsüchte für eine Krönung in Rom
column2: um seine Heiligkeit der Papst. Hoffentlich wird er akzeptieren meine Bitte
column3: damit ich anfangen kann meine Herren einladen
column4: um die Krönungszeremonie beizuwohnen.;;I expressed my wishes and desires for a coronation in Rome to his holiness the Pope. Hopefully he will accept my request so that I can begin inviting my lords to attend the coronation ceremony.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1000182428;To the most Reverend and Blessed Apostolic Pope
column2:
I would like to ask you for your blessing in my rule as Emperor-elect by holding officially holding a coronation ceremony in my honour.

Your most devoted subject
column3: \n[From.GetTitledName];Au Vénérable et Bienheureulx Pape Apostolique
column4:
J'aimerois vous demander votre bénédiction pour mon règne en tant qu'Empereur-élu par la tenue d'une cérémonie de couronnement en mon honneur.

Votre sujet le plus dévoué
column5: \n[From.GetTitledName];Zu den vererten und seligen Apostolischen Papst
column6: würde \n\nl nich möchte Ihnen für Ihren Segen bitten werdet in meinem Herrschaft als Kaiser-elect
column7: indem offiziell im Besitz einer Krönungszeremonie in meiner Ehre. \n\n Euer ergebener Diener;;To the most Reverend and Blessed Apostolic Pope
column8:
I would like to ask you for your blessing in my rule as Emperor-elect by holding officially holding a coronation ceremony in my honour.

Your most devoted subject
column9: \n[From.GetTitledName];;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1000182429;To the most devout and serene [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column2: \nIn the name of the Lord
column3: I
column4: [From.GetTitledName]
column5: would like to offer you my blessing to allow your coronation in Rome
column6: as Holy Roman Emperor
column7: under my guidance.;Au Pieulx et Sérénissime [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column8: \nAu nom de Notre Seigneur
column9: moi
column10: [From.GetTitledName]
column11: voudrais vous offrir ma bénédiction pour votre couronnement à Rome
column12: comme Saint Empereur Romain
column13: par moi conseillé.;An den frommen und heitern [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column14: \nIm Namen des Herrn
column15: Ich
column16: [From.GetTitledName]
column17: möchte Euch meinen Segen anbieten und Eure Krönung in Rom ermöglichen
column18: als römisch-deutscher Kaiser.;;To the most devout and serene [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column19: \nIn the name of the Lord
column20: I
column21: [From.GetTitledName]
column22: would like to offer you my blessing to allow your coronation in Rome

column1: EVTDESC1000182430;To his Majesty [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column2: \nIn the name of the Lord
column3: I
column4: [From.GetTitledName]
column5: would like to inform you that I deem you are not yet worthy and just enough as a ruler to be offered my blessings to become crowned as the Holy Roman Emperor. The Lord surely has much faith in you as you have in him
column6: but remember that the honour of receiving His blessing does not come easy and is only for the purest of souls.\nSigned
column7: \n[From.GetTitledName];A Sa Majesté [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column8: \nAu nom de Notre Seigneur
column9: Nous
column10: [From.GetTitledName]
column11: voudrions vous informer que nous ne vous jugeons point encor assez digne et juste comme souverain pour vous octroyer notre bénédiction en tant que Saint Empereur Romain couronné. Le Seigneur à susrement plus de foi en vous que vous en Lui
column12: mais n'oubliez point que l'honneur de recevoir Sa Bénédiction n'est point chose aisée et est réservé aulx plus pures des asmes.\nSigned
column13: \n[From.GetTitledName];An seine Majestät [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column14: \n Im Namen des Herrn
column15: Wir
column16: [From.GetTitledName]
column17: möchten Euch mitteilen
column18: dass Wir Weuch noch nicht für würdig genug befinden
column19: um meinen Segen und die Reichskrone der römisch-deutschen Kaiser zu emfangen. Der Herr hat sicher viel Vertrauen in Euch
column20: wie Ihr zu ihm. Aber denkt daran
column21: dass die Ehre der Reichskrone zur dem zuteil wird
column22: der die reinste Seele in Seien Augen vorweist. \n gezeichnet
column27: would like to inform you that I deem you are not yet worthy and just enough as a ruler to be offered my blessings to become crowned as the Holy Roman Emperor. The Lord surely has much faith in you as you have in him
column28: but remember that the honour of receiving His blessing does not come easy and is only for the purest of souls.\nSigned

column1: EVTDESC1000182431;To Noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column2: \nYou should be happy to know that
column3: I
column4: [From.GetTitledName]
column5: will hold a coronation ceremony in Rome in my honour with the blessing of his Holiness the Pope. You received the honour to be invited to attend the ceremony
column6: which will be held soon in Rome. I await your postive reply.\n\nYour most Holy Lord and Liege
column7: \n[From.GetTitledName];Au Noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column8: \nVous devriez estre heureulx d'apprendre que moi
column9: [From.GetTitledName]
column10: vais organiser une cérémonie de couronnement à Rome en mon honneur avec la bénédiction de Sa Sainteté le pape. Vous avez l'honneur d'estre invité pour assister à la cérémonie
column11: qui devroit avoir lieu sous peu à Rome. J'attends votre réponse positive.\n\nVotre Très Saint Seigneur et Suzerain
column12: \n[From.GetTitledName];An den edlen [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column13: \n Ihr sollet froh sein
column14: zu wissen
column15: dass ich
column16: [From.GetTitledName]
column17: eine Krönungszeremonie in Rom zu meinen Ehren halten werde
column18: mit dem Segen Seiner Heiligkeit des Papstes. Ihr erhaltet die Ehre
column19: zu dieser Zeremonie
column20: die in Kürze in Rom stattfinden soll
column21: eingeladen zu werden. Ich erwarte Eure positive Antwort. \n\nNeuer allerheiligster Herr
column22: \n[From.GetTitledName];;To Noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column23: \nYou should be happy to know that
column26: will hold a coronation ceremony in Rome in my honour with the blessing of his Holiness the Pope. You received the honour to be invited to attend the ceremony
column27: which will be held soon in Rome. I await your postive reply.\n\nYour most Holy Lord and Liege

column1: EVTDESC1000182432;[From.GetTitledName] is sorry to inform you that he will not be able to attend the coronation ceremony in Rome as he has more important issues to attend to.;[From.GetTitledName] est désolé de vous informer qu'il ne pourra point assister à la cérémonie de couronnement à Rome car il a des choses plus importantes à faire.;[From.GetTitledName] bedauert
column2: Euch mitzuteilen
column3: dass er nicht in der Lage ist
column4: die Krönungszeremonie in Rom zu besuchen
column5: da er wichtigere Dinge zu erledigen hat.;;[From.GetTitledName] is sorry to inform you that he will not be able to attend the coronation ceremony in Rome as he has more important issues to attend to.;;;;;;;;x;

column1: EVTDESC1000182433;"Today I was crowned by his Holiness the Pope and formally received the title of ""Holy Roman Emperor"" and the Imperial Regalia with the blessing of the Pope.";"Aujourd'hui j'ai été couronné par Sa Sainteté le Pape et ai formellement reçu le titre de ""Saint Empereur Romain"" et les Regalia Impériaulx avec la bénédiction du Pape.";"Heute wurde ich von Seiner Heiligkeit dem Papst gekrönt und erhielt offiziell den Titel ""Kaiser"" und die Reichskleinodien mit dem Segen des Papstes.";;"Today I was crowned by his Holiness the Pope and formally received the title of ""Holy Roman Emperor"" and the Imperial Regalia with the blessing of the Pope.";;;;;;;;x;

EVTDESC1000182434;"Today [From.GetTitledFirstName] was crowned by his Holiness the Pope and formally received the title of ""Holy Roman Emperor"" and the Imperial Regalia with the blessing of the Pope. The ceremony was magnificent.";"Aujourd'hui [From.GetTitledFirstName] a été couronné par Sa Sainteté le Pape et a formellement reçu le titre de ""Saint Empereur Romain"" avec la bénédiction du Pape. La cérémonie estoit grandiose.";"Heute wurde [From.GetTitledFirstName] von Seiner Heiligkeit dem Papst gekrönt und erhielt offiziell den Titel ""Kaiser"" und die Reichskleinodien mit dem Segen des Papstes. Die Zeremonie war großartig.";;"Today [From.GetTitledFirstName] was crowned by his Holiness the Pope and formally received the title of ""Holy Roman Emperor"" and the Imperial Regalia with the blessing of the Pope. The ceremony was magnificent.";;;;;;;;x;

EVTDESC1000182435;[From.GetTitledFirstName] has been crowned and received the Imperial Regalia by his holiness the Pope in the St. Basilica in Rome. The divine blessings conveyed by his Holiness the Pope confirm the right of rule over all Imperial lands governed by [From.GetTitledFirstName] and his appointed vassals.;[From.GetTitledFirstName] a été couronné et a reçu les regalia Impériaulx par Sa Sainteté le Pape en la Sainte Basilique de Rome. Les bénédictions divines transmisent par Sa Sainteté le Pape confirme son droit de régner sur toutes les terres Impériales gouvernées [From.GetTitledFirstName] et ses vassaulx fieffés.;[From.GetTitledFirstName] wurde gekrönt und erhielt die Reichskleinodien von Seiner Heiligkeit dem Papst in der Basilika St. in Rom. Der göttliche Segen
column2: vermittelt durch seine Heiligkeit den Papst
column3: bestätigt das Recht
column4: über alle kaiserlichen Ländereien von [From.GetTitledFirstName] und seine Vasallen zu herrschen.;;[From.GetTitledFirstName] has been crowned and received the Imperial Regalia by his holiness the Pope in the St. Basilica in Rome. The divine blessings conveyed by his Holiness the Pope confirm the right of rule over all Imperial lands governed by [From.GetTitledFirstName] and his appointed vassals.;;;;;;;;x;

column1: EVTDESC1000182436;"In the name of Christ
column2: I
column3: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column4: promise
column5: pledge and guarantee in the sight of God and the blessed Apostle Peter that I will be the protector and defender of this holy Roman Church in all ways useful to her
column6: however many
column7: in so far as I am supported by divine assistance according to my knowledge and ability.\n\nToday [Root.GetTitledFirstName] was crowned by his Holiness the Pope and formally received the title of ""Holy Roman Emperor"" and the Imperial Regalia with the blessing of the Pope.";"Au Nom du Christ
column8: Nous
column9: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column10: promettons
column11: nous engageons et jurons devant Dieu et le bienheureulx Apostre Pierre que Nous serons le protecteur et le défenseur de la très-sainte Eglise Romaine
column12: que Nous la servirons en toutes occasions
column13: ou au moins dans moultes
column14: dans la mesure où Nous sommes soutenus par la divine assistance et en accord avec nos propres connaissances et capacités.\n\nAujourd'hui [Root.GetTitledFirstName] a été couronné par Sa Sainteté le Pape et a formellement reçu le titre de ""Saint Empereur Romain"" et les Regalia Impériaulx avec la bénédiction du Pape.";"Im Namen Christi
column15: Ich
column16: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column17: Unterpfand und Garant in den Augen Gottes und der seligen Apostel Petrus
column18: verspreche
column19: dass ich der Beschützer und Verteidiger dieser heiligen römischen Kirche mit allen erforderlichen Mitteln sein werde. \n\n Heute wurde [Root.GetTitledFirstName] von Seiner Heiligkeit dem Papst gekrönt und erhielt offiziell den Titel ""Kaiser"" und die Reichskleinodien mit dem Segen des Papstes.";;"In the name of Christ
column20: I
column21: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column22: promise
column23: pledge and guarantee in the sight of God and the blessed Apostle Peter that I will be the protector and defender of this holy Roman Church in all ways useful to her
column25: in so far as I am supported by divine assistance according to my knowledge and ability.\n\nToday [Root.GetTitledFirstName] was crowned by his Holiness the Pope and formally received the title of ""Holy Roman Emperor"" and the Imperial Regalia with the blessing of the Pope.";;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182437;I have decided to legitimize [From.GetFullName] and make [From.GetHerHim] a member of my dynasty.;J'ai décidé de legitimer [From.GetFullName] et d'en faire un membre de ma dynastie.;Ich habe mich zum Legitimierung von [From.GetFullName] entschlossen und damit [From.GetHerHim] ein Mitglied meiner Dynastie zu machen.;;I have decided to legitimize [From.GetFullName] and make [From.GetHerHim] a member of my dynasty.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1000182565;We have founded the Herculeans
column2: an order of warriors devoted to Hercules
column3: the mightiest of the heroes. They will tirelessly seek to emulate his exploits and battle against the followers of the Judean and Arabian prophets.;Nous avons fondé les Herculéens
column4: un ordre de guerriers consacré à Hercule
column5: le plus puissant des héros. Ils querront sans relasche à émuler ses exploits et guerroieront les disciples des prophètes de Judée et d'Arabie.;We have founded the Herculeans
column6: an order of warriors devoted to Hercules
column7: the mightiest of the heroes. They will tireless seek to emulate his exploits and battle against the followers of the Judean and Arabian prophets.;;We have founded the Herculeans
column8: an order of warriors devoted to Hercules
column9: the mightiest of the heroes. They will tireless seek to emulate his exploits and battle against the followers of the Judean and Arabian prophets.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1000182566;The Herculeans are zealous Hellenic warriors
column2: who emulate the greatest hero of their myths. They have vowed that no longer shall the followers of the ancient Hellenic faith bow their heads before foreign gods!;Les Herculéens sont de zélés guerriers helléniques
column3: qui émulent le plus grand héros de leurs mythes. Ils ont fait le serment que les disciples de l'antique foi hellénique ne baissent plus jamais la teste devant des dieulx étrangers !;The Herculeans are zealous Hellenic warriors
column4: who emulate the greatest hero of their myths. They have vowed that no longer shall the followers of the ancient Hellenic faith bow their heads before foreign gods!;;The Herculeans are zealous Hellenic warriors
column5: who emulate the greatest hero of their myths. They have vowed that no longer shall the followers of the ancient Hellenic faith bow their heads before foreign gods!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1000182567;We have founded the Sacred Band
column2: a closed brotherhood of soldiers whose iron discipline shall defend Hellenic believers everywhere.;Nous avons fondé la Bande Sacrée
column3: une fraternité de soldats triés sur le volet dont la discipline de fer viendra à la défense des disciples helléniques où qu'ils soient.;We have founded the Sacred Band
column4: a closed brotherhood of soldiers whose iron discipline shall defend Hellenic believers everywhere.;;We have founded the Sacred Band
column5: a closed brotherhood of soldiers whose iron discipline shall defend Hellenic believers everywhere.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1000182568;The Sacred Band are a brotherhood of soldiers noted for their stalwart discipline and unwavering resolution who have sworn to never rest until the Gods of Olympus are granted the respect they are due.;La Bande Sacrée est une fraternité de soldats connus pour leur discipline
column2: leur loyauté et leur détermination sans faille
column3: qui ont fait le serment de ne jamais trouver le repos jusqu'à ce que les Dieulx de l'Olympe reçoivent le respect qu'ils méritent.;The Sacred Band are a brotherhood of soldiers noted for their stalwart discipline and unwavering resolution who have sworn to never rest until the Gods of Olympus are granted the respect they are due.;;The Sacred Band are a brotherhood of soldiers noted for their stalwart discipline and unwavering resolution who have sworn to never rest until the Gods of Olympus are granted the respect they are due.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1000182569;We have founded the Bræðralag
column2: a fellowship of sworn brethren fighting for a place in Valhalla!;Nous avons fondé le Bræðralag
column3: une communauté fraternelle se battant pour une place au Valhalla !;We have founded the Bræðralag
column4: a fellowship of sworn brethren fighting for a place in Valhalla!;We have founded the Bræðralag
column5: a fellowship of sworn brethren fighting for a place in Valhalla!;;We have founded the Bræðralag
column6: a fellowship of sworn brethren fighting for a place in Valhalla!;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182570;The Bræðralag are proud heathen warriors who swear oaths of brotherhood to each other
column2: and swear to fight until they please Oðinn and the heathen gods.;Le Bræðralag est constitué de fiers guerriers païens qui ont fait voeu de fraternité les uns envers les aultres
column3: et ont fait le serment de se battre jusqu'à ce qu'Odin et les dieulx païens soient satisfaits.;The Bræðralag are proud heathen warriors who swear oaths of brotherhood to each other
column4: and swear to fight until they please Odinn and the heathen gods.;The Bræðralag are proud heathen warriors who swear oaths of brotherhood to each other
column5: and swear to fight until they please Odinn and the heathen gods.;;The Bræðralag are proud heathen warriors who swear oaths of brotherhood to each other
column6: and swear to fight until they please Odinn and the heathen gods.;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182571;We have founded the Úlfheðnar
column2: a brotherhood of berserker warriors who wear wolf-skins and unleash their fury on the enemies of the Norse!;Nous avons fondé l'Úlfheðnar
column3: une fraternité de guerriers berserk qui se vestissent de peaulx de loup et déchaisnent leur fureur sur les ennemis des Nordiques !;We have founded the Úlfheðnar
column4: a brotherhood of berserker warriors who wear wolf-skins and unleash their fury on the enemies of the Norse!;;We have founded the Úlfheðnar
column5: a brotherhood of berserker warriors who wear wolf-skins and unleash their fury on the enemies of the Norse!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: ignoring pain and fear.;L'Úlfheðnar sont de féroces guerriers païens qui se vestissent de peaulx de loup et attaquent leurs ennemis avec une terrible soif de sang

column1: EVTDESC1000182573;The proud Herculeans have requested that we let them construct a fortress near Mount Olympus to use as their base.;Les fiers Herculéens nous ont demandé la permission de construire une forteresse près du Mont Olympe qui seroit leur base d'opérations.;The proud Herculeans have requested that we let them construct a fortress near Mount Olympus to use as their base.;;The proud Herculeans have requested that we let them construct a fortress near Mount Olympus to use as their base.;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC1000182574;The fortress of the Herculeans stands strong in the shade of Mount Olympus
column2: strong as our gods. Within
column3: the warlike Herculeans ready themselves for the wars to come against the snivelling Christians and the traitorous Mohammedans.;La forteresse des Herculéens s'élève désormais
column4: imposante
column5: dans les contreforts du Mont Olympe
column6: aussi puissante que nos dieulx. À l'intérieur
column7: les belliqueulx Herculéens se préparent pour les guerres à venir contre ces pleureurs de Chrétiens et les perfides Mahométans.;The fortress of the Herculeans stands strong in the shade of Mount Olympus
column8: strong as our gods. Within
column9: the warlike Herculeans ready themselves for the wars to come against the snivelling Christians and the traitorous Mohammedans.;;The fortress of the Herculeans stands strong in the shade of Mount Olympus

column1: EVTDESC1000182575;Since I still don't have a male heir
column2: I may need to consider the possibility of my realm passing to my daughter. Rulership is harder for a woman
column3: but not impossible. If I were to start raising her as my heir now
column4: she would be better prepared should she succeed me to the throne...;Comme je n'ai toujours point d'héritier masculin
column5: je pourrois envisager que ma fille hérite de mon royaume. Il est plus difficile pour une femme de régner
column6: mais ce n'est point impossible. Si je commençois à l'élever comme mon héritière dès à présent
column7: elle seroit mieulx préparée si elle devoit un jour me succéder au trosne...;Since I still don't have a male heir
column8: I may need to consider the possibility of my realm passing to my daughter. Rulership is harder for a woman
column9: but not impossible. If I were to start raising her as my heir now
column10: she would be better prepared should she succeed me to the throne...;;Since I still don't have a male heir
column11: I may need to consider the possibility of my realm passing to my daughter. Rulership is harder for a woman
column12: but not impossible. If I were to start raising her as my heir now
column13: she would be better prepared should she succeed me to the throne...;;;;;x;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182576;Since I now have a male heir
column2: it is no longer necessary to train my daughter to rule.;Comme j'ai à présent un héritier masculin
column3: il n'est plus nécessaire de préparer ma fille à régner.;Since I now have a male heir
column4: it is no longer necessary to train my daughter to rule.;;Since I now have a male heir

column1: EVTDESC1000182578;[From.GetTitledFirstName] has disinherited you in favour of his daughter.;[From.GetTitledFirstName] vous a déshérité en faveur de sa fille.;[From.GetTitledFirstName] has disinherited you in favour of his daughter.;;[From.GetTitledFirstName] has disinherited you in favour of his daughter.;;;;x;;;;;

EVTDESC1000182579;I'm not getting any younger and my daughter is already a woman grown. I could ask all my vassals to swear to give her allegiance and loyally support her accession to the throne.;Je ne suis plus tout jeune et ma fille est déjà une adulte. Je pourrois demander à tous mes vassaulx de lui prester allégeance et de soutenir loyalement son accession au trosne.;I'm not getting any younger and my daughter is already a woman grown. I could ask all my vassals to swear to give her allegiance and loyally support her accession to the throne.;;I'm not getting any younger and my daughter is already a woman grown. I could ask all my vassals to swear to give her allegiance and loyally support her accession to the throne.;;;;;x;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182591;All the men are looking at me and all the other ladies are jealous of me! I feel justified in my pride.;J'attire le regard de tous les hommes
column2: et toutes les aultres femmes sont jalouses de moi ! Il me paraist légitime d'estre fière.;All the men are looking at me and all the other ladies are jealous of me! I feel justified in my pride.;;All the men are looking at me and all the other ladies are jealous of me! I feel justified in my pride.;;;;x;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182592;I'm receiving alot of attention
column2: but I won't let it get to me. We all have our virtues and our vices.;Je reçois moulte attention
column3: mais je ne laisse point cela me monter à la teste. Nous avons tous nos vertus et nos vices.;I'm receiving alot of attention
column4: but I won't let it get to me. We all have our virtues and our vices.;;I'm receiving alot of attention
column5: but I won't let it get to me. We all have our virtues and our vices.;;;;x;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182593;This tournament is wonderful
column2: there are so many people to talk to! I've met so many new friends already...;Ce tournoi est merveilleulx
column3: Il y a tellement de gens à qui parler ! Je me suis déjà fait tellement d'amis...;This tournament is wonderful
column4: there are so many people to talk to! I've met so many new friends already...;;This tournament is wonderful
column5: there are so many people to talk to! I've met so many new friends already...;;;;;;x;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182594;There are so many strange people here
column2: I don't feel at ease around them. Just now
column3: a woman I have never seen before tried to strike up a conversation...;Il y a tellement de gens que je ne connois point ici
column4: je ne me sens point à l'aise en leur présence. À l'instant
column5: une femme que je n'avois jamais vue a tenté d'engager la conversation avec moi...;There are so many strange people here
column6: I don't feel at ease around them. Just now
column7: a woman I have never seen before tried to strike up a conversation...;;There are so many strange people here
column8: I don't feel at ease around them. Just now
column9: a woman I have never seen before tried to strike up a conversation...;;;;;x;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182595;Not everyone here seems to appreciate my honesty.;Pas tout le monde semble apprécier mon honnesteté par ici.;Not everyone here seems to appreciate my honesty.;;Not everyone here seems to appreciate my honesty.;;;;;x;;;;
EVTDESC1000182596;The ladies here are so easy to fool. I could tell them that in Cathay the sky is green
column2: and they would believe me.;Les dames sont si faciles à berner par ici. Je pourrois leur dire que le ciel est vert en Cathay
column3: et elles me croiraient.;The ladies here are so easy to fool. I could tell them that in Cathay the sky is green
column4: and they would believe me.;;The ladies here are so easy to fool. I could tell them that in Cathay the sky is green
column5: and they would believe me.;;;;;x;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182597;Some of the knights here are really dreamy. If one of them were to proposition me
column2: I think I would swoon!;Certains chevaliers ici sont vraiment charmants. Si l'un d'entre eulx venait à me faire la cour
column3: je crois que j'en tomberais en pasmoison !;Some of the knights here are really dreamy. If one of them were to proposition me
column4: I think I would swoon!;;Some of the knights here are really dreamy. If one of them were to proposition me
column5: I think I would swoon!;;;;;x;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182598;Some of the ladies here let their heads be turned by a pretty face and a dashing joust
column2: but not I.;Certaines dames ici se pasment au premier joli visage venu et une joute galante
column3: mais point moi.;Some of the ladies here let their heads be turned by a pretty face and a dashing joust
column4: but not I.;;Some of the ladies here let their heads be turned by a pretty face and a dashing joust
column5: but not I.;;;;x;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182599;I may have been admitted into the tournament
column2: but I keep hearing jeering whispers behind me. It seems some of the men here think I'm unworthy of competing in their martial games.;Je suis admis au tournoi
column3: mais je continue d'ouïr des murmures railleurs dans mon dos. Il semble que certains hommes ici me trouvent indigne de participer à leurs jeulx martiaulx.;I may have been admitted into the tournament
column4: but I keep hearing jeering whispers behind me. It seems some of the men here think I'm unworthy of competing in their martial games.;;I may have been admitted into the tournament
column5: but I keep hearing jeering whispers behind me. It seems some of the men here think I'm unworthy of competing in their martial games.;;;;;x;;;;

column9: comme la plus noble
column10: grascieuse

column1: EVTDESC1000182633;Long has it been since the Northmen invaded these lands. Some may argue their methods

column1: EVTDESC1000182634;Around our lands more people are using this Russian language and I find this is a perfect means for an overlord to get his serfs to work properly. We continue to use our own influence to promote this means of communication in the interests of more efficient realm.;À travers nos terres
column2: de plus en plus de monde emploie la langue russe et je trouve que c'est le moyen parfait pour un suzerain de mettre ses serfs au labeur comme il faut. Nous continuons à utiliser notre propre influence pour promouvoir ce moyen de communication dans l'intérest d'un royaume plus efficace.;Around our lands more people are using this Russian language and I find this is a perfect means for an overlord to get his serfs to work properly. We continue to use our own influence to promote this means of communication in the interests of more efficient realm.;;Around our lands more people are using this Russian language and I find this is a perfect means for an overlord to get his serfs to work properly. We continue to use our own influence to promote this means of communication in the interests of more efficient realm.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1000182635;Although many dislike change
column2: this new Russian language does have a certain functionality that cannot be denied. I have therefore prevailed upon a member of my court to adopt this for everyday administrative use.;Bien que moults abhorrent le changement
column3: cette nouvelle langue russe possède une certaine fonctionalité qui ne peult estre niée. C'est pourquoi j'ai persuadé un membre de ma cour d'adopter cette langue pour un usage administratif quotidien.;Although many dislike change
column4: this new Russian language does have a certain functionality that cannot be denied. I have therefore prevailed upon a member of my court to adopt this for everyday administrative use.;;Although many dislike change
column5: this new Russian language does have a certain functionality that cannot be denied. I have therefore prevailed upon a member of my court to adopt this for everyday administrative use.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1000182636;I was considering important business when I had an amazing insight. To strengthen my realm I must bring my vassals round to my way of thinking. This involves communication. If I can get them to communicate like me then I will have a much smoother running realm.;Je réfléchissois à une affaire importante lorsque j’ai eu une idée étonnante. Pour renforcer mon Royaume
column2: je dois convertir mes vassaulx à ma façon de penser. Cela passe par la communication. Si je parviens à leur faire adopter mon mode de communication
column3: mon Royaume fonctionnera bien mieulx.;Beim Nachdenken über ein wichtiges Geschäft kam ich zu einer erstaunlichen Einsicht: Zur Stärkung meines Reichs muss ich meine Vasallen von meiner Denkweise überzeugen
column4: und dazu gehört auch die Kommunikation. Wenn ich es schaffen könnte
column5: dass alle wie ich kommunizieren
column6: so wäre mein Reich viel einfacher zu regieren.;;Estaba ocupado con asuntos importantes cuando tuve una súbita revelación. Para reforzar mi reino debo lograr que mis vasallos compartan mi forma de pensar. Eso implica comunicación. Si logro que se comuniquen como yo mi reino funcionará mucho mejor.;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC1000182638;At last the Great Schism between the Western Catholic Church and the Eastern Orthodox Church has been mended
column2: but not by either of the expected sides
column3: but rather the Coptic church has proven to be the savior of Christendom. With the spread of the Coptic faith and the reunification of the Pentarchy
column4: including the vital episcopal see of Constantinople
column5: the other Christian faiths now holds little sway over the people of Europe. There will be those who still cling to it
column6: but they will be few in number and the Pentarchy can once more claim universal rule over all of Christendom.;Enfin
column7: le Grand Schisme entre l'Eglise Catholique Occidentale et l'Eglise Orthodoxe Orientale a pris fin
column8: mais non point grasce à l'un des camps aulxquels on pouvoit s'attendre
column9: mais plutost grasce à l'Eglise Copte qui s'est révélée estre le sauveur de la Chrétienté. Avec la diffusion de la foi copte et la réunification de la Pentarchie
column10: incluant le capital évesché épiscopal de Constantinople
column11: les aultres fois chrétiennes n'ont plus guère d'influence désormais sur les peuples d'Europe. Il y en aura qui s'y accrocheront
column12: mais ils seront peu nombreulx et la Pentarchie peult une fois de plus proclamer son règne universel sur toute la Chrétienté.;At last the Great Schism between the Western Catholic Church and the Eastern Orthodox Church has been mended
column13: but not by the either of the expected sides
column14: but rather the Coptic church has proven to be the savior of Christendom. With the spread of the Coptic faith and the reunification of the Pentarchy
column15: including the vital episcopal see of Constantinople
column16: the other Christian faiths now holds little sway over the people of Europe. There will be those who still cling to it
column17: but they will be few in number and the Pentarchy can once more claim universal rule over all of Christendom.;;At last the Great Schism between the Western Catholic Church and the Eastern Orthodox Church has been mended
column18: but not by the either of the expected sides
column19: but rather the Coptic church has proven to be the savior of Christendom. With the spread of the Coptic faith and the reunification of the Pentarchy

column1: EVTDESC1000182648;The Islands and Peninsula south of Rome have fallen to those who oppose Christianity. Whispers have been heard that the pope the is frantically considering funding an expedition to reconquer the peninsula.;Les Isles et la Péninsule au sud de Rome sont tombées aulx mains de ceulx qui s'opposent à la Chrétienté. On murmure que le Pape envisage frénétiquement le financement d'une mission de reconqueste de la péninsule.;The Islands and Peninsula south of Rome have fallen to those who oppose Christianity. Whispers have been heard that the pope the is frantically considering funding an expedition to reconquer the peninsula.;;The Islands and Peninsula south of Rome have fallen to those who oppose Christianity. Whispers have been heard that the pope the is frantically considering funding an expedition to reconquer the peninsula.;;;;;;;;;

EVTDESC1000182683;A storm has struck my fleet! Scores of soldiers and at least one of my commanders have been drowned by the raging waters.;Une tempeste a frappé ma flotte ! Moults soldats et au moins un de mes commandants ont été noyés par les eaulx enragées;Ein Sturm hat meine Flotte versenkt! Zahlreiche Soldaten und mindestens einer meiner Befehlshabern sind in dem tobenden Wasser ertrunken.;;A storm has struck my fleet! Scores of soldiers and at least one of my commanders have been drowned by the raging waters.;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC1000182684;The Civil War has weakened the authority of the crown to the point where my own distant and disconnected realm cannot be considered a part of [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] any longer.;La guerre civile a affaibli l'autorité de la couronne
column2: au point où mon propre royaume lointain ne peult plus estre considéré comme une partie de [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName].;The Civil War has weakened the authority of the crown to the point where my own distant and disconnected realm cannot be considered a part of [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] any longer.;;The Civil War has weakened the authority of the crown to the point where my own distant and disconnected realm cannot be considered a part of [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] any longer.;;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182685;The Civil War has weakened the authority of the crown to the point where [From.GetTitledName] has become effectively independent.;La guerre civile a affaibli l'autorité de la couronne
column2: [From.GetTitledName] est devenu indépendant.;The Civil War has weakened the authority of the crown to the point where [From.GetTitledName] has become effectively independent.;;The Civil War has weakened the authority of the crown to the point where [From.GetTitledName] has become effectively independent.;;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182689;Unsurprisingly the pope has chosen a promising local young Italian mercenary band to take control of Southern Italy away from the Heathens. With official Papal support this young Mercenary captain hopes to achieve the crown of Sicily
column2: as promised by the pope.;Sans surprise
column3: le Pape a choisi une prometteuse compagnie de jeunes mercenaires italiens de la contrée pour reprendre le controsle du Sud de l'Italie aulx Païens. Avec le soutien officiel du Pape
column4: le jeune capitaine mercenaire espère gagner la couronne de Sicile
column5: promise par le Pape.;Unsurprisingly the pope has chosen a promising local young Italian mercenary band to take control of Southern Italy away from the Heathens. With official Papal support this young Mercenary captain hopes to achieve the crown of Sicily
column6: as promised by the pope.;;Unsurprisingly the pope has chosen a promising local young Italian mercenary band to take control of Southern Italy away from the Heathens. With official Papal support this young Mercenary captain hopes to achieve the crown of Sicily
column7: as promised by the pope.;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182690;The re-conquest of Sicily was an astounding success. The pope has motioned to officially crown the King of Sicily today. Already the pope makes plans for future such events
column2: some have even said they’ve heard rumours of such a thing being called a Crusade. Time can only tell what will happen next.;La reconqueste de la Sicile s'est avérée estre une stupéfiante réussite. Le Pape couronnera le Roi de Sicile aujourd'hui. Le Pape ébauche déjà des plans pour rééditer ces événements à l'avenir
column3: certains disent mesme avoir ouï une rumeur comme quoi cela s'appellerait désormais une Croisade. Seul le temps dira ce qu'il adviendra par la suite.;The re-conquest of Sicily was an astounding success. The pope has motioned to officially crown the King of Sicily today. Already the pope makes plans for future such events
column4: some have even said they’ve heard rumours of such a thing being called a Crusade. Time can only tell what will happen next.;;The re-conquest of Sicily was an astounding success. The pope has motioned to officially crown the King of Sicily today. Already the pope makes plans for future such events
column5: some have even said they’ve heard rumours of such a thing being called a Crusade. Time can only tell what will happen next.;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182691;In a very surprising and bold move the Pope has decided to give the Norsemen of the North a chance to prove themselves worthy of the crown of Sicily. Of course they submitted to papal authority prior to being allowed to invade Southern Italy. This should prove to be a very interesting series of events
column2: no matter the outcome.;Le Pape a
column3: de manière très surprenante et audacieuse
column4: décidé de donner aulx Nordiques de Scandinavie une chance de se prouver dignes de la couronne de Sicile. Bien susr
column5: ils se sont soumis à l'autorité papale avant d'estre autorisés à envahir le Sud de l'Italie. Cela devroit estre une suite d'événements particulièrement intéressante
column6: quel qu'en soit le résultat.;In a very surprising and bold move the Pope has decided to give the Norsemen of the North a chance to prove themselves worthy of the crown of Sicily. Of course they submitted to papal authority prior to being allowed to invade Southern Italy. This should prove to be a very interesting series of events
column7: no matter the outcome.;;In a very surprising and bold move the Pope has decided to give the Norsemen of the North a chance to prove themselves worthy of the crown of Sicily. Of course they submitted to papal authority prior to being allowed to invade Southern Italy. This should prove to be a very interesting series of events
column8: no matter the outcome.;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182692;After having heard the success of the Normans
column2: the pope has decided to give them an offer they can’t refuse. They’ll be allowed to invade southern Italy with full papal support. Should they succeed
column3: they’ll be crowned by the pope himself as Kings of Sicily.;Après avoir eu vent du succès des Normands
column4: le Pape a décidé de leur faire une offre impossible à refuser. Ils seront autorisés à envahir le l'Italie méridionale avec le plein support du Pape. S'ils remportent la victoire
column5: ils seront couronnés par le Pape lui-mesme Rois de Sicile.;After having heard the success of the Normans
column6: the pope has decided to give them an offer they can’t refuse. They’ll be allowed to invade southern Italy with full papal support. Should they succeed
column7: they’ll be crowned by the pope himself as Kings of Sicily.;;After having heard the success of the Normans
column8: the pope has decided to give them an offer they can’t refuse. They’ll be allowed to invade southern Italy with full papal support. Should they succeed
column9: they’ll be crowned by the pope himself as Kings of Sicily.;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182693;Having heard the news of southern Italy’s struggle
column2: some Croatian mercenaries have volunteered to help the pope. Impressed by their determination and self-sacrifice he has decided to give official papal support to these mercenaries to take back Italy. Should they succeed
column3: the crown of Sicily awaits them.;Ayant eu vent des épreuves endurées par l'Italie méridionale
column4: des mercenaires croates ont offert leurs services au Pape. Impressionné par leur determination et leur abnégation
column5: il a décidé de leur accorder un soutien papal officiel pour reprendre l'Italie. S'ils remportent la victoire
column6: la couronne de Sicile les attendra.;Having heard the news of southern Italy’s struggle
column7: some Croatian mercenaries have volunteered to help the pope. Impressed by their determination and self-sacrifice he has decided to give official papal support to these mercenaries to take back Italy. Should they succeed
column8: the crown of Sicily awaits them.;;Having heard the news of southern Italy’s struggle
column9: some Croatian mercenaries have volunteered to help the pope. Impressed by their determination and self-sacrifice he has decided to give official papal support to these mercenaries to take back Italy. Should they succeed
column10: the crown of Sicily awaits them.;;;;;;;;;

column2: some Serbian mercenaries have volunteered to help the pope. Impressed by their determination and self-sacrifice he has decided to give official papal support to these mercenaries to take back Italy. Should they succeed
column3: the crown of Sicily awaits them.;Ayant eu vent des épreuves endurées par l'Italie méridionale
column4: des mercenaires serbes ont offert leurs services au Pape. Impressionné par leur determination et leur abnégation
column5: il a décidé de leur accorder un soutien papal officiel pour reprendre l'Italie. S'ils remportent la victoire
column6: la couronne de Sicile les attendra.;Having heard the news of southern Italy’s struggle
column7: some Serbian mercenaries have volunteered to help the pope. Impressed by their determination and self-sacrifice he has decided to give official papal support to these mercenaries to take back Italy. Should they succeed

column1: EVTDESC1000182695;Often forgotten
column2: but there are still resident Greeks in southern Italy. After having affirmed their support of the Pope of Rome they now seek to re-conquer their lost lands from the heathen invaders. Motivation is certainly not lacking for these people.;Souvent oubliés
column3: des Grecs vivent pourtant toujours en Italie méridionale. Après avoir affirmé leur soutien au Pape de Rome
column4: ils quièrent à présent à reconquérir leurs terres perdues aulx mains des envahisseurs païens. Ces gens ne manquent certainement point de motivation en tout cas.;Often forgotten
column5: but there are still resident Greeks in southern Italy. After having affirmed their support of the Pope of Rome they now seek to re-conquer their lost lands from the heathen invaders. Motivation is certainly not lacking for these people.;;Often forgotten
column6: but there are still resident Greeks in southern Italy. After having affirmed their support of the Pope of Rome they now seek to re-conquer their lost lands from the heathen invaders. Motivation is certainly not lacking for these people.;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182696;An auspicious day it is indeed
column2: for you will be crowned the King of Sicily by none other than the pope himself. As you approach the pope
column3: you can't help but feel a sense of pride rise within you.;C'est en effet un jour bien faste
column4: car vous allez estre couronné Roi de Sicile par nul aultre que le Pape lui-mesme. Tandis que vous vous approchez du Pape
column5: vous ne pouvez vous empescher de vous sentir fier de vous.;An auspicious day it is indeed
column6: for you will be crowned the King of Sicily by none other than the pope himself. As you approach the pope
column7: you can't help but feel a sense of pride rise within you.;;An auspicious day it is indeed
column8: for you will be crowned the King of Sicily by none other than the pope himself. As you approach the pope
column9: you can't help but feel a sense of pride rise within you.;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182697;The pope's plans have failed. His trusted champions have been dispersed and there's little hope for a Christian reconquering of Sicily.;Les desseins du Pape ont échoué. Les champions à qui il avoit fait confiance se sont faits écraser et il y a peu d'espoir pour une reconqueste chrétienne de la Sicile.;The pope's plans have failed. His trusted champions have been dispersed and there's little hope for a Christian reconquering of Sicily.;;The pope's plans have failed. His trusted champions have been dispersed and there's little hope for a Christian reconquering of Sicily.;;;;;;;;;

EVTDESC1000182700;You send your servants to immediately plan for the your to partake in the upcoming Ramadan.;Vous envoyez vos serviteurs préparer sur-le-champ votre participation au Ramadan.;You send your servants to immediately plan for the your to partake in the upcoming Ramadan.;;You send your servants to immediately plan for the your to partake in the upcoming Ramadan.;;;;;;;;;
EVTDESC1000182701;The planning is over
column2: let Ramadan begin!;Les préparations sont terminées
column3: que le Ramadan commence !;The planning is over
column4: let Ramadan begin!;;The planning is over
column5: let Ramadan begin!;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182703;Now that the war is done you send a message to your family telling them to come out of hiding.;À présent que la guerre est finie
column2: vous envoyez un message à votre famille pour leur dire de sortir de leur cachette.;Now that the war is done you send a message to your family telling them to come out of hiding.;;Now that the war is done you send a message to your family telling them to come out of hiding.;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTDESC1000182705;There has not been a Kohen Gadol – a High Priest of Judaism – since the Romans destroyed the Second Temple roughly a thousand years ago. At long last
column2: this position has been filled and the High Priesthood reconstituted.\n\nThe Samaritans have held the tradition of a Kohen Gadol steadfast
column3: despite their exile from the Holy Land and so the Kohen Gadol himself now returns to where he belongs.;Il n'y a point eu de Kohen Gadol – un Grand Prestre du Judaisme – depuis que les Romains ont détruit le Second Temple il y a de ça environ mille ans. Mais enfin
column4: quelqu'un remplit ce rosle et le Haut Sacerdoce a été reconstitué.\n\nLes Samaritains ont constamment maintenu la tradition d'un Kohen Gadol
column5: malgré leur exil de la Terre Sainte et c'est ainsi que Kohen Gadol lui-mesme retourne à présent là où il appartient.;There has not been a Kohen Gadol – a High Priest of Judaism – since the Romans destroyed the Second Temple roughly a thousand years ago. At long last
column6: this position has been filled and the High Priesthood reconstituted.\n\nThe Samaritans have held the tradition of a Kohen Gadol steadfast
column7: despite their exile from the Holy Land and so the Kohen Gadol himself now returns to where he belongs.;;There has not been a Kohen Gadol – a High Priest of Judaism – since the Romans destroyed the Second Temple roughly a thousand years ago. At long last
column8: this position has been filled and the High Priesthood reconstituted.\n\nThe Samaritans have held the tradition of a Kohen Gadol steadfast
column9: despite their exile from the Holy Land and so the Kohen Gadol himself now returns to where he belongs.;;;;;;;;;

EVTDESC1000182853;My changes to the crown authority of the Empire have now been fully implemented across the realm.;Le changement d'autorité de la Couronne de l'Empire que j'ai désiré est désormais pleinement mis en œuvre à travers le Royaume.;Meine Änderungen der Krone-Autorität  sind jetzt im ganzen Reich durchgeführt worden.;;My changes to the crown authority of the Empire have now been fully implemented across the realm.;;;;;;;x;;

EVTDESC1000182857;The change in crown authority has forced me to change some of my demesne laws.;Le changement de l'autorité de la couronne m'a forcé à changer certaines de mes lois domaniales.;Die Veränderung der Kronautorität hat mich gezwungen
column2: einige meiner Herrschaftgesetze zu verändern.;;The change in crown authority has forced me to change some of my demesne laws.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1000182859;The sharp decline of my power and territories have not gone unnoticed by other rulers. While I continue to insist on my claims to Imperial dignity
column2: it is clear that my peers no longer take them seriously.;La forte baisse de mon pouvoir et de mes territoires ne sont point passées inaperçues aulx yeulx des aultres souverains. Bien que je continue d'insister sur mes prétentions à la dignité impériale
column3: il est clair que mes pairs ne me prennent plus au sérieulx.;Der starke Rückgang meiner Macht und Territorien hat sich den anderen Herrscher nicht unbemerkt passiert. Während ich auf meinen Anspruch auf dem Kaisertum fortsetze
column4: ist es klar
column5: dass meine Kollegen mich nicht mehr ernst nehmen.;;The sharp decline of my power and territories have not gone unnoticed by other rulers. While I continue to insist on my claims to Imperial dignity
column6: it is clear that my peers no longer take them seriously.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1000182865;This was not a just act!;Ce n'estoit point un acte juste !;Das war kein rechtmäßiger Akt!;;This was not a just act!;;;;;;x;;;

EVTDESC1000182868;I have reclaimed the Byzantine Empire for the Orthodox faith. The title of Augustus is rightfully mine.;J'ai repris l'Empire Byzantin au nom de la foi Orthodoxe.
